required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of Single IV Dose of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion in Healthy Subjects.
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, Uncontrolled, and Dose-escalation Study Evaluating Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of Single IV Dose of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion in Healthy Subjects.

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: his single-center, open-label, uncontrolled, and dose-escalation study evaluated the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics of single IV dose of HSK3486 injectable emulsion in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose of study drug on day 1
primary_outcome.description: No movement of chest wall and cessation of end-tidal carbon dioxide waveform > 15 seconds.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety by measurement of Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose of study drug on day 1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the change of modified observer's assessment of alert /sedation during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1
From first dose of study drug until fully alert on day 1
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal elimination half life (t1/2z) and mean residence time (MRT)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve (AUC0-30min, AUC0-1h, AUC0-last, and AUC0-inf)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration
From the start of administration to 48 hours after administration

intervention.description: Mmanual IV bolus injection completed in 1 minute.
